code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./TodoForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TodoForm=_ref=>{let{addTodo}=_ref;const[input,setInput]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(input.trim()){addTodo({id:Date.now(),text:input,completed:false});setInput('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"todo-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value),placeholder:"Add a new task",className:"todo-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"todo-button",children:"Add"})]});};export default TodoForm;
